The Default Switch

Jan 07, 2010

michel

sosa

Michel is currently an undergradstudying mathematics and over the past four yearshas been trying to make sense of letters adding up to something. He originates from the tip-of-texas; Brownsville where he tried to discover the Art of Zen (which he is not currently discovering). Whenever he's not crowding the local coffee shops with his setup, he's telling knock knock jokes to his friends and family or making computery things happen.
